nodes.text: Antar Bintaghr was a male Human soldier of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite Yavin Coalition along with Imperial forces under Darth Marr.
Antar Bintaghr appeared as a Trooper gear vendor in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014. He was later removed during a gear system restructuring.
